ctx: intros h h' t r st.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros h h' t r st. unfold leaderLogs. unfold update_elections_data_requestVoteReply. destruct (Nat.ltb t (currentTerm (snd st))) eqn:ltb_condition. - simpl. auto. - destruct (fin_eq_dec N r (fst (votedFor (snd st)))) eqn:votedFor_condition. + simpl. auto. + simpl. right. reflexivity.
